entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Addition vectorized functions #103845
    9.0.0
  • ILC: FileNotFoundException for base type from unresolved assembly #103843
  • Regex with negated non-ascii ranges emits empty `IndexOfAnyExcept` check #103842
  • Consider emitting unicode escape sequences for character ranges in the regex source generator #103840
  • nativeaot/SmokeTests/Exceptions failing with `Assertion failed: (n_heaps <= heap_number) || !gc_t_join.joined()` #103839
  • [API Proposal]: Support boolean type discriminator in `JsonDerivedType` #103834
    Future
  • ILLink should error out when failing to resolve assemblies/types/members #103831
    10.0.0
  • [browser] System.Memory.Tests is taking too long on FF #103829
    9.0.0
  • NuGet restore failing with NullReferenceException #103823
  • Review and consider upstreaming vcpkg patches to nethost cmake files and headers #103816
  • ThreadPool unfriendly to background processes #103812
  • [browser] Omit copying assets to build output using StaticWebAssets SDK file path mapping #103810
    10.0.0
  • StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103802
    9.0.0
  • [System.Threading.RateLimiting] Request Leaky Bucket rate limiter #103800
  • Failure in the Exceptions smoke test with CFG #103798
    9.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Emit value type mismatch trying to create a value type #103796
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Incorrect general long time pattern for some cultures on Android #103592
  • Instrument<T>.RecordMeasurement does not record if given empty TagList on .NET Framework #97948
    9.0.0
  • DefaultMeterFactory does not pass MeterOptions future properties to Meter constructor #97941
    9.0.0
  • Finding Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting service provider with using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #88485
  • Optimization removes necessary code #103477
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] perf/aot regression in Normalize ASCII #98522
    9.0.0
  • Enable featuredefault Substitutions To Only Apply at App Publish Time #96539
    9.0.0
  • Default IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch to true for CoreCLR #80398
    9.0.0
  • Getting errors while running dotnet/performance (https://github.com/dotnet/performance) benchmark with mono #80922
  • crossgen2 error due to .NET 8 dependency in source build #93666
  • .NET 9.0 Preview 2 Android part of MAUI do not compile #101130
  • Possibly broken NuGet package for System.Data.Odbc 7.0 #88281
  • Incorrect if evaluation results in `if (true != true)` being true #103786
  • [mono] Windows CI failures in BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #103811
  • Performance: Potentially uneeded nullcheck for using? #103808
  • string.IndexOf() on Thai Culture , Windows11, 64 bits, .net5,6,7,8, return incorrect index #100381
  • Double.TryParse fails on string that has thousands separator. Regression? #100397
  • String.IndexOf has incorrectly behavier in Thai(Thaiand) region #100803
  • lots of unresolved symbols in static lib? #103747

PullRequests

Created

  • Define JIT format jobs as GitHub Actions instead of AzDO jobs #103846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark generic arguments for unresolved generic types #103844
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Use correct cast_class for IntPtr[] #103841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Avoid rare deadlocks when using TypeDescriptor #103835
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add riscv64 arch to tracing/eventpipe/processinfo tests #103832
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Add RiscV64 arch to tests/JIT/Stress/ABI/ #103830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve use of PAL's RawData for X509Certificate #103828
    area-System.Security
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherPrefetch #103826
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103822
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make DAC return Module instead of PEAssembly for DacpModuleData::PEAssembly #103821
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Vectorize a few more conversions in TensorPrimitives.ConvertXx #103820
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Set AnyCPU for ProjectReference to source generators #103819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enbale TYP_MASK support for ARM64 #103818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103817
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reduce some allocations in SslStream handshake. #103814
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Clean up liveness #103809
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #103807
    area-Infrastructure
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #103805
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incorrect time patterns for some cultures on browser in `HybridGlobalization` #103804
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [x64][SysV] Classify empty structs for passing like padding #103799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix the ICU time format conversion logic #103681
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-preview6] Flow preview6 emsdk #103827
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Misc Metrics Fixes #103791
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • JIT: rely on DFS for cycle entry detection in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #103788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix return type marshalling on IsKeyStorePrivateKeyEntry #103825
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • JIT: Clean up `FlowGraphDominatorTree::Build` #103803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid substring allocation in Environment.ReadXdgDirectory #103765
    needs-area-label
  • Improve Span.Count #103728
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Default DynamicCodeSupport to true for CoreCLR #103594
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Enable compaction of all `BBJ_ALWAYS` blocks #103785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.ReverseBits() #103806
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add Not, InsertIntoShiftedVector #103725
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Avoid char[] allocation in AltSvcHeaderParser #103764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a couple string allocs in EventSource's ManifestBuilder ctor #103744
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Use span-based dictionary lookup in System.Console #103742
    area-System.Console
  • Improve WebUtility.HtmlEncode / UrlEncode performance #103737
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103777
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete forgotten ActiveIssue from Http3 Tests #103794
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [LoongArch64] Fix build error for LA64. #103792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable BackwardsCompat_Downgrade test on WinHttpHandler #103797
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use new ABI classifiers for `GenTreeCall` arguments #103537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Http3 tests for Arm #103793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x

Updated

  • JIT: Added SVE APIs - `Test*`, `ExtractVector` #103739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2479501 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Update HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to use a binary search #103778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Use SRM's TypeName parser in ILLink #103740
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #103710
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Intrinsics for blazor" #103774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Use bitshift instead of multiply in Unsafe.Add intrinsic if possible #103775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][firefox] Test crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #103706
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.Splice() #103567
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Use a hash table for HW intrinsic name -> ID lookups #103763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update to preview 7 #103789
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser][publish] Windows has problems with AOT build/publish for long paths #103766
    arch-wasm, os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix field accessor for RVA field #103705
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] [NativeAOT-LLVM] What defines if jobs has a `Initialize containers` step? #2618

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move dotnet.js to aotsdk #2604
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Portable RID PublishAOT doesn't work from source-build VMR .NET 9 Preview 5 #41727
  • `dotnet workload install` in userlocal mode fails with source-build .NET 9 Preview 5 #41726
  • .NET Worker Project Fails on macOS When AssemblyName xml tag is provided and its value ends with .Service #41724
  • [Mac/Linux]After installing SDK 8.0.303 (July Update), wasm tools workload installation failed: Version 8.0.7 of package microsoft.net.runtime.webassembly.sdk is not found in NuGet feeds. #41715

Closed

  • [System.Threading.RateLimiting] Request Leaky Bucket rate limiter #41714

PullRequests

Created

  • Minimize container dependency redistribution #41740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid redistributing MSBuild.dll #41739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop generating useless .dll.configs #41738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Minimize assemblies redistributed in Containers folders #41737
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set CI Job timeouts #41733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid crossgen for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic #41731
    untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Preview 7 Branding #41704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Searched switch statement #8234

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Open questions for field-backed properties #8231
  • Add open questions for partial properties interaction with field keyword #8202
  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decisions #8232

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069
  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #8220
  • Update first-class Span speclet #8221

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.DotNet.GenAPI.Tests/CSharpFileBuilderTests.cs in SDK repo test failures #74109
  • Cycle in required members #74108
  • Error/Warning messages on network share are not navigable #74105
  • Code Lens doesn't show references on Source Generated files #74104
  • Add compiler warning about CS file name not matching the class/interface contained within #74092

Closed

  • OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute seemed no respected #74067
  • switch expression: Warning CS8524 issued although all cases have been covered #74076
  • type hints for collection expressions #72250
    Backlog
  • False positive CS4007 "Instance of type 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Buffer10<int>>' cannot be preserved across 'await' or 'yield' boundary" #74046
  • Record structs with InlineArray attribute compares only by the first value. #73504
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35020.20 #74094
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35020.110 #74093

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle early attribute required members cycle #74110
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test active statements in source generated files #74107
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Make sure task completes on exception path #74106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sign `VSSetup/Installer/Roslyn_Preview.zip` #74103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable some type test scenarios involving ref like type parameters #74102
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Reduce time spent in ConflictResolver.Session.GetNodesOrTokensToCheckForConflicts #74101
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #74099
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Add LSP notification for starting project initialization #74095
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Query for the COM service provider instead of direct cast #74100
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocations in AbstractSyntaxIndex<>.GetIndexAsync #74075
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add type hints for collection expressions #74051
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Align implementation with latest LDM decisions around invocations in presence of dynamic arguments. #74097
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Disallow `InlineArray` attribute on a record struct type. #74072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next

Updated

  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • On the fly docs - add telemetry regarding documentation comments #74088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle unspecified anonymous type property in VisualBasicOperationFactory #74091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test #74085
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.11
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #74024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MapAssets System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: (Parameter 'offset') Actual value was 0. #56371
  • [API Proposal]: Add new constructor for `HttpValidationProblemDetails` that accepts a `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, string[]>>` #56370
  • Enable case-insensitive route parameter binding for enums #56369
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56366
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #56365
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_spring, mapaction #56364
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #56363
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes, fortunes #56362
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, single_query #56361
  • 406 Not Accepted when returning ObjectResult with content type 'application/json; charset=utf-8' #56357
  • Perf regression: mvc #56356

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56355
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56139
  • Security concern with accessing server-side Blazor services from a different DI scope / semaphore needed? #56341
  • Perf improvement: https, json #56347

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up nullability and primitive type handing in schema generation #56372
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Remove incorrect suppressions from AwaitableInfo #56360
    area-mvc

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as switch instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FontImageSource in Button and ImageButton doesn't display properly #23191
  • Bad performance while using OData client vs using HttpClient on Android #23185
  • Color.FromHsla only returns white color #23180
  • Play a local video on Android in MAUI app #23179
  • AppIcon not displayed for Android 7 #23178
  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android when GestureRecognizers were changed after rendering. #23177
  • FlexLayout Items (such as buttons, labels and so, etc) Padding not Working #23175
  • TabbedPage doesn't change icon colour #23174
  • Image is flickering after ImageSource change #23172

Closed

  • The Comma Seperator is disabled on the Samsung Numeric keyboard. #22761
  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed #15102
    Backlog
  • MAUI projects with an ampersand in the name can't be built or loaded #21090
  • Improper Insert Behavior on ListView for Windows #22393
    Backlog
  • Add Manual Test to Validate the ScrollView behavior of our templates #17801
    Backlog
  • [net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak on page with CollectionView #23032
  • Memory leak with Shell Navigation #22313
    Backlog
  • XAMLC error in .NET 9 Preview 5 #22975
    9.0-preview6
  • iOS PopModalAsync causes memory leaks #21453
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Is "UseMauiCompatibility()" to port from Xamarin.iOS to MAUI fully functional? #20075
  • CollectionView only measure first item on Windows #15468
  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android when GestureRecognizers were changed after rendering. #23176
  • Unable to compile iOS Binding Library #23162
  • Width value return -1 #23171
  • Button - Pressed VisualState not setting ImageSource or Custom Properties #8471
  • `StackLayout` in `RefreshView` expands outside of the screen bounds #9371
  • Failed to AOT compile while building iOS IPA and using Microsoft.Maui.Essentials NuGet package in a class library #15104
  • ListView Items Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17654
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #15910
  • NavigationPage throws unknown null reference error despite being null #22878
  • Unable to control SafeArea of a ContentPage which is inside of a shell #22858
  • Autofac.Core.DependencyResolutionException Error in .Net Maui Blazor. #22970
  • iOS: CollectionView Crashes when clearing ObservableCollection & adding data second time onwards #22949

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
  • [Windows] Fix horizontal scroll not working w/ CollectionView #23188
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-controls-scrollview
  • Call base.OnResume if Existing NavigationFragment Early #23187
  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨
  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181

Merged

  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, stale, area-gestures
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in TabbedPage #23166
    memory-leak 💦
  • warnings ignored on compatability #23189
  • Bump to Android 34.0.113 #23120
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed - fix #23170
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui templates #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [ci] Set OfficialBuildId when building asset manifests #23102
    area-infrastructure
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [ios/catalyst] fix more cycles in `NavigationPage` #23164
    memory-leak 💦
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-core-platform
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml

Updated

  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow #23169
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #23129
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AOT/Compiled model: Somewhat complex entity with enums produces compiled model that contains AOT warnings #34057
  • AOT/Query: for queries with JSON, interceptors generate code with labels that are not uniquified #34056
  • Add-Migration in Package Manager Console never completes breaking package manager until VS2022 exit #34055
  • Indexes are created by default for foreign keys in non-relational databases #34053
    9.0.0
  • How to use custom annotations through migrations #34049

Closed

  • Querying all objects of a type hierarchy #33972
  • Cosmos: projection of primitive collection throws when entity type embeds owned types #34008
    9.0.0-preview7
  • The Cosmos type mapping source is too permissive #34022
    9.0.0-preview7
  • Cosmos type mapper does not call plugins first #34041
    9.0.0-preview7
  • I keep getting: The foreign key property 'Vehicle.CustomerId1' was created in shadow state because a conflicting property with the simple name 'CustomerId' exists in the entity type #33883

PullRequests

Created

  • Index convention changes for non-relational providers #34054
    providers-beware
  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #34051
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #34050
  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048

Merged

  • Cosmos: Minor refactoring of array extraction/conversion as extension methods (trivial) #34045
  • Stop generating includes in nav expansion for primitive collection properties #34047
  • Changes and tests for Cosmos type mapping #34042

Updated

  • fixing cosmos test failures on linux #34058
